name: Fractal Image File
summary: Learn about .FIF files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: FIF files are created using a lossy compression algorithm. The algorithm identifies common fractals within the original image and then reconstructs the image using the fractals. This allows FIF files to be compressed at ratios as high as 2500:1.
FIF files can be saved and loaded in Adobe Photoshop with the Genuine Fractals plug-in.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
Adobe Photoshop with Genuine Fractals plug-in
